subtitleNullable: 1500 journal entries labelled with emotions from people reflecting on their day
descriptionNullable:
## Context

This dataset is from the [paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/1903.07766), "Lemotif: An Affective Visual Journal Using Deep Neural Networks" by X. Li and Devi Parikh. It was collected from 500 respondents on Mechanical Turk in a survey. 

The respondents had to answer the question: **"What were salient aspects of your day yesterday? How did you feel about them?”.** 

In addition, they had to label their text-based response with **one or more of 18 emotions:**
- Happy
- Satisfied
- Calm
- Proud
- Excited
- Frustrated
- Anxious
- Surprised
- Nostalgic
- Bored
- Sad
- Angry
- Confused
- Disgusted
- Afraid
- Ashamed
- Awkward
- Jealous

Finally, they had to label their text-based response with **one or more of 11 topics:**
- Family
- Work
- Food 
- Sleep
- Friends
- Health
- Recreation
- God
- Love
- School
- Exercise

## Content

There are 1473 examples. Each example has the following columns:
- `Answer` (text): field with the respondent's answer to: "What were salient aspects of your day yesterday? How did you feel about them?”
- `Answer.f1.afraid.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled afraid as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.angry.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled angry as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.anxious.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled anxious as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.ashamed.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled ashamed as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.awkward.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled awkward as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.bored.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled bored as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.calm.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled calm as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.confused.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled confused as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.disgusted.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled disgusted as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.excited.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled excited as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.frustrated.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled frustrated as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.happy.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled happy as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.jealous.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled jealous as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.nostalgic.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled nostalgic as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.proud.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled proud as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.sad.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled sad as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.satisfied.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled satisfied as an emotion
- `Answer.f1.surprised.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled surprised as an emotion
- `Answer.t1.exercise.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled exercise as a topic
- `Answer.t1.family.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled family as a topic
- `Answer.t1.food.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled food as a topic
- `Answer.t1.friends.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled friends as a topic
- `Answer.t1.god.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled god as a topic
- `Answer.t1.health.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled health as a topic
- `Answer.t1.love.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled love as a topic
- `Answer.t1.recreation.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled recreation as a topic
- `Answer.t1.school.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled school as a topic
- `Answer.t1.sleep.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled sleep as a topic
- `Answer.t1.work.raw` (boolean): whether the respondent labelled work as a topic


## Acknowledgements

This dataset is from the [paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/1903.07766), "Lemotif: An Affective Visual Journal Using Deep Neural Networks" by X. Li and Devi Parikh. It can be accessed online [here](https://github.com/xaliceli/lemotif).


### Paper
```
@misc{li2019lemotif,
    title={Lemotif: An Affective Visual Journal Using Deep Neural Networks},
    author={X. Alice Li and Devi Parikh},
    year={2019},
    eprint={1903.07766},
    archivePrefix={arXiv},
    primaryClass={cs.HC}
}
```

### Code
```

  author       = {X. Alice Li and Devi Parikh},
  title        = {Lemotif: Affective Visual Journal},
  month        = jul,
  year         = 2019,
  doi          = {10.5281/zenodo.3269893},
  url          = {https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3269893}
}
```
